thread.title: Hackers have a new way to steal your banking login using WhatsApp
thread.title_full: Hackers have a new way to steal your banking login using WhatsApp

author: Chris Smith
title: Hackers have a new way to steal your banking login using WhatsApp
text:
Hackers are targeting unsuspecting users with a new type of mobile virus that spreads through legitimate-looking word documents sent via WhatsApp, which could then steal sensitive information from users, including online banking credentials and other data. 
Continue reading...
